features: 【3S 11.1V 5200mAh 120C Lipo Battery Specification】 Voltage: 11.1V; Capacity: 5200mAh; Discharge Rate: 120C; Connector type: EC5 connection. Hardcase. Cells: 3S; Configuration: 3S1P; Cell Voltage: 3.7~4.2V; HOOVO 4S lipo battery is made of lithium polymer material, durable and reusable.
【RC Battery parameters】 11.1V 5200mAh Lipo battery dimensions(±2mm):138*47*37mm/5.43*1.85*1.45inch (L x W x H); Approximate Weight(±10g):251g/0.55lb/pc.

【3S RC Battery Application】3S 5200mAh 120C HardCase Lipo Battery compatible with RC Helicopter, Airplane, Multirotor, Boat, Car, Truck, Slash VXL, Slash 4x4 VXL, E-Maxx Brushless, E-Revo Brushless and Spartan models, Redcat Racing, Exceed RC, ElectrixRC, Bandit, Rustler version etc. (Only if voltage, dimension and plug match, it will fit).
【Fast Charge】HOOVO 3-cell battery has long-lasting and powerful energy, discharges high voltage instantly, has a long service life (at least 150 times), and energy density of up to 235Wh/kg.
【Packaging and After-Sales Service】 2 * HOOVO 3S 5200mAh 80C HardCase with EC5 Plug Lipo Batteries; 1 * User Manual. HOOVO batteries meet RoHS and CE quality standards.
description: Product Description HOOVO RC Battery 3S 11,1V 5200mAh 80C EC5 Hardcase 2pcs Specifications of HOOVO 3S 11.1V 5200mAh 80C EC5 Hard Case Battery type: LiPo battery Battery material: lithium polymer Battery voltage: 11.1V Cell configuration: 3S Battery capacity: 5200mAh Discharge rate (C): 80C Plug type: EC5 Case type: HardCase Maximum volt range per cell: 4.2V Dimensions(±3mm): 138*47*37mm/5.43*1.85*1.45inch (L*W*H)/pcs Weight(±5g): 251g/0.55lb/pcs Package includes: 2pcs 3S 11.1 5200mAh 80C hard case with EC5 connector; 1 * User Manual HOOVO 3S 5200mAh LiPo batteries Experience increased power and performance in your RC models with the HOOVO 3S 5200mAh LiPo batteries. With a high capacity of 5200mAh , these batteries deliver improved acceleration, extended flight times, and longer runtime, allowing you to enjoy longer and more exciting RC experiences. The impressive 80C discharge rate ensures fast power delivery, making these batteries ideal for demanding maneuvers and powerful RC models. Equipped with a widely used EC5 plug connection, HOOVO batteries offer convenient compatibility with various RC models and chargers. The hard case offers a higher level of protection and protection against mechanical damage, moisture, and dirt, improved heat dissipation and easier handling and transport. Take your RC experience to a new level with the HOOVO 3S 5200mAh LiPo batteries and unleash the full potential of your RC models. HOOVO 3S lithium battery material, high quality, long battery life HOOVO 3S RC LiPo battery series The LiPo battery is made of high-quality raw materials from Japan and South Korea. High discharge rate, high stability, excellent battery performance. Low resistance, constant voltage, safer and more secure use. Long service life, at least 150 times. Batteries live longer. HOOVO 3S 11.1V 5200mAh 80C with EC5 plug compatible with RC Helicopter, Airplane, Multirotor, Boat, Car, Truck, Slash VXL, Slash 4x4 VXL, E-Maxx Brushless, E-Revo Brushless & Spartan Models, Redcat Racing, Exceed RC, ElectrixRC, Bandit, Rustler Version. Most scales of 1/8, 1/10, etc. Note: Only if the voltage, dimension and plug match, it will fit. Precautions for using HOOVO LiPo battery Before charging, check the battery voltage with a digital voltage tester. Use a professional LiPo balance charger. Never charge lithium polymer batteries unattended. Do not overcharge the battery above 4.2V or discharge below 3.2V. If the new battery does not hold a full charge or loses charge quickly within a short period of time, please use a balance charger to charge and discharge it several times. Do not expose LiPo batteries to extreme temperatures. Check your LiPo batteries regularly for signs of swelling, damage or wear. If you notice any abnormalities such as swelling or leakage, stop using the battery and dispose of it properly according to local regulations. If you have any questions, please click the “Your Orders” section in your Amazon account and choose "help". Q&A Q1：How do I choose the right battery for my device? A：Check the device manual or observe/measure the device to find out the required battery type, voltage, size and plug connection. Consider factors such as capacity and discharge rate based on the needs of the device. Compare the device requirements with the battery information provided in the battery description. Select a battery that meets the requirements of the device in terms of type, voltage, size and connector connection. Q2：How to know the actual capacity of the battery? A: Please test it. Before testing, make sure the original battery power has been used up and fully charged for the second time.
